languages.text: "А лет пятнадцать тому, когда я еще и первого своего не родила, корабль развез по объектам три бригады, а на обратном пути попался пиратам. Корабли в рейде не один год летают, хватились его поздно, про мусорщиков подумали еще позднее, да и непросто было найти корабль, что их навестить и забрать. В общем... все три бригады того. Вот так вот".

traits.locale_text: "А лет пятнадцать тому, когда я еще и первого своего не родила, один корабль развез по объектам три отряда мусорщиков, а на обратном пути попался пиратам. Узнали очень поздно про это, да и найти корабль, чтоб забрал ребят, непросто. В общем... все три отряда того. Вот так вот".
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "And about fifteen years ago, back before I had my first little one, a ship took three crews to locations and ran into pirates on the way back. The ships go out on expeditions for years at a time, so it was ages before anyone realised they were missing, and it was even longer before they remembered the scavengers, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews had bought it. Yep."
languages.original_text: "А лет пятнадцать тому, когда я еще и первого своего не родила, корабль развез по объектам три бригады, а на обратном пути попался пиратам. Корабли в рейде не один год летают, хватились его поздно, про мусорщиков подумали еще позднее, да и непросто было найти корабль, что их навестить и забрать. В общем... все три бригады того. Вот так вот".

traits.locale_text: "And about fifteen years ago, back before I had my first tot, a ship took three crews to locations and ran into pirates on the way back. The ships go out on raids for years at a time, so they noticed pretty late, and they remembered about the scavengers even later, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews bought it. Yep."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

The ships go out on raids for years at a time, so they noticed pretty late, and they remembered about the scavengers even later, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews bought it. Yep."

The ships go out on expeditions for years at a time, so it was ages before anyone realised they were missing, and it was even longer before they remembered the scavengers, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews had bought it. Yep."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: “大概十五年前，我还没生第一个小家伙的时候，有一艘飞船带着三个拾荒者离开了，但回来的路上碰到了海盗。那艘船每次出去探险都要花上好几年的时间，所以过了好久好久，才有人意识到那些人失踪了。等到那些人想起来还有几个拾荒者没管，那又是很久以后的事情了。为了找到一艘可以把那些拾荒者接回来的船，又额外花了很多时间。长话短说……那三个人早就一命呜呼了，嗯。”
languages.original_text: "And about fifteen years ago, back before I had my first little one, a ship took three crews to locations and ran into pirates on the way back. The ships go out on expeditions for years at a time, so it was ages before anyone realised they were missing, and it was even longer before they remembered the scavengers, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews had bought it. Yep."

traits.locale_text: “大概十五年前，我还没生第一个小家伙的时候，有一艘飞船带着三个拾荒者离开了，但回来的路上碰到了海盗。那艘船每次出去探险都要花上好几年的时间，所以过了好久好久，才有人意识到那些人失踪了。等到那些人想起来还有几个拾荒者没管，那又是很久以后的事情了。为了找到一艘可以把那些拾荒者接回来的船，又额外花了很多时间。长话短说……那三个人早就一命呜呼了，嗯。”
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: «Y hace unos quince años, antes de que tuviera a mi primer niño, una nave llevó tres tripulaciones a distintos lugares y se cruzó con unos piratas en el camino de vuelta. Las naves salen de expedición durante años, de modo que pasó mucho tiempo hasta que alguien se dio cuenta de que habían desaparecido, y aún más hasta que recordaron a los carroñeros, además de lo que tardaron en encontrar una nave que pudiera ir a buscarlos. En definitiva... las tres tripulaciones habían palmado. Básicamente».
languages.original_text: "And about fifteen years ago, back before I had my first little one, a ship took three crews to locations and ran into pirates on the way back. The ships go out on expeditions for years at a time, so it was ages before anyone realised they were missing, and it was even longer before they remembered the scavengers, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews had bought it. Yep."

traits.locale_text: «Y hace unos quince años, antes de que tuviera a mi primer niño, una nave llevó tres tripulaciones a distintos lugares y se cruzó con unos piratas en el camino de vuelta. Las naves salen de expedición durante años, de modo que pasó mucho tiempo hasta que alguien se dio cuenta de que habían desaparecido, y aún más hasta que recordaron a los carroñeros, además de lo que tardaron en encontrar una nave que pudiera ir a buscarlos. En definitiva... las tres tripulaciones habían palmado. Básicamente».
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: 「そして、約15年前、私の一番上の子供が生まれる前のことですが、ある船が3人のクルーを乗せてあちこちに行き、その帰りに海賊に遭遇しました。船は一度に何年も遠征することがあるので、その船が行方不明になったと人々が気付くまでに何年もかかりました。そして人々が廃品回収業者のことを思い出すまでにさらに時間がかかり、さらに、行方不明になった船の様子を確認して、クルーを連れ戻してくれる船を見つけるのにも時間がかかりました。つまるところ…3人のクルー全員が殺害されていました」
languages.original_text: "And about fifteen years ago, back before I had my first little one, a ship took three crews to locations and ran into pirates on the way back. The ships go out on expeditions for years at a time, so it was ages before anyone realised they were missing, and it was even longer before they remembered the scavengers, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews had bought it. Yep."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、約15年前、私の一番上の子供が生まれる前のことですが、ある船が3人のクルーを乗せてあちこちに行き、その帰りに海賊に遭遇しました。船は一度に何年も遠征することがあるので、その船が行方不明になったと人々が気付くまでに何年もかかりました。そして人々が廃品回収業者のことを思い出すまでにさらに時間がかかり、さらに、行方不明になった船の様子を確認して、クルーを連れ戻してくれる船を見つけるのにも時間がかかりました。つまるところ…3人のクルー全員が殺害されていました」
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Und vor fünfzehn Jahren, kurz vor meinem ersten Nachwuchs, brachte ein Schiff drei Crews an verschiedene Orte und stieß auf dem Rückweg auf Piraten. Die Schiffe sind bei Expeditionen jahrelang unterwegs, es dauerte also ewig, bis sie überhaupt vermisst wurden, und noch länger, bis sich jemand an die Plünderer erinnerte und ein Schiff hinschickte, um sie abzuholen. Lange Rede, kurzer Sinn ... alle drei Crews waren tot. So war das."
languages.original_text: "And about fifteen years ago, back before I had my first little one, a ship took three crews to locations and ran into pirates on the way back. The ships go out on expeditions for years at a time, so it was ages before anyone realised they were missing, and it was even longer before they remembered the scavengers, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews had bought it. Yep."

traits.locale_text: "Und vor fünfzehn Jahren, kurz vor meinem ersten Nachwuchs, brachte ein Schiff drei Crews an verschiedene Orte und stieß auf dem Rückweg auf Piraten. Die Schiffe sind bei Expeditionen jahrelang unterwegs, es dauerte also ewig, bis sie überhaupt vermisst wurden, und noch länger, bis sich jemand an die Plünderer erinnerte und ein Schiff hinschickte, um sie abzuholen. Lange Rede, kurzer Sinn ... alle drei Crews waren tot. So war das."
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: « Et il y a une quinzaine d'années, avant la naissance de mon premier enfant, un vaisseau a déposé trois équipes à différents endroits et il est tombé sur des pirates sur le chemin du retour. Comme les vaisseaux partent en expédition pendant des années entières, il a fallu une éternité avant que quelqu'un se rende compte qu'il avait disparu, et plus longtemps encore pour se rappeler de l'existence des récupérateurs. Si on ajoute à ça le temps nécessaire pour trouver un autre vaisseau et partir à leur recherche... Bref... le temps qu'on les retrouve, les trois équipes avaient passé l'arme à gauche. Eh oui. »
languages.original_text: "And about fifteen years ago, back before I had my first little one, a ship took three crews to locations and ran into pirates on the way back. The ships go out on expeditions for years at a time, so it was ages before anyone realised they were missing, and it was even longer before they remembered the scavengers, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews had bought it. Yep."

traits.locale_text: « Et il y a une quinzaine d'années, avant la naissance de mon premier enfant, un vaisseau a déposé trois équipes à différents endroits et il est tombé sur des pirates sur le chemin du retour. Comme les vaisseaux partent en expédition pendant des années entières, il a fallu une éternité avant que quelqu'un se rende compte qu'il avait disparu, et plus longtemps encore pour se rappeler de l'existence des récupérateurs. Si on ajoute à ça le temps nécessaire pour trouver un autre vaisseau et partir à leur recherche... Bref... le temps qu'on les retrouve, les trois équipes avaient passé l'arme à gauche. Eh oui. »
traits.speaker: ScavengerLeader

languages.text: "Bir de on beş yıl kadar önce, daha ben ilk çocuğumu doğurmadandı... Geminin teki, üç ekibi bir yerlere götürmüş ama dönüşte korsanlara çatmış. Gemilerin uzun yıllar sefere çıkıp dönmediği olduğu için millet geminin kaybolduğunu fark edene kadar yıllar geçmesin mi? Hurdacıların varlığını hatırlamaları de bir o kadar sürmüş. Hurdacıları kontrole gidip yerinden alacak bir gemi bulmaları da ayrı hikâye. Uzun lafın kısası... Üç ekip de sizlere ömür."
languages.original_text: "And about fifteen years ago, back before I had my first little one, a ship took three crews to locations and ran into pirates on the way back. The ships go out on expeditions for years at a time, so it was ages before anyone realised they were missing, and it was even longer before they remembered the scavengers, plus it took some time to find a ship that could check on them and pick them up. Long story short... all three crews had bought it. Yep."
